title: Cannabis And Alcohol Beverage Industries Are On a Collision Course, With Ted Dumbauld
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Ted Dumbauld is COO of Curio Wellness and founder of SoNo 1420, the world’s first hemp-infused whiskey and gin distillery. Ted joined Rena Sherbill to discuss why hands on labor is not ideal for cultivation, declining alcohol sales in states where cannabis is legal, and why consolidation is here to stay. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

Ted Dumbauld is COO of Curio Wellness and founder of SoNo 1420, the world’s first hemp-infused whiskey and gin distillery. Ted joined Rena Sherbill to discuss why hands on labor is not ideal for cultivation, declining alcohol sales in states where cannabis is legal, and why consolidation is here to stay.
